body.name: Delta Children Apollo Jogging Stroller - Shock Absorbing Frame with Large Canopy & Recline - Car Seat Compatible, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 22 hrs 3 mins
features: SMOOTH RIDE: 12-inch front wheel and 16-inch back wheels with back brakes | Puncture-proof wheels| Shock absorbing frame | Tons of storage space with the included parent organizer with two cup holders and extra-large basket under the frame

KEEPS KIDS & PARENTS COMFY: Extendable water-resistant canopy with UPF 50+ and peek-a-boo window | Adjustable foam handlebar works for all different heights | Swing out child tray | Reclining seat features multiple positions

COMPATIBILITY: Included adapter fits the following car seats: Graco SnugRide Click Connect; Evenflo Nurture & Embrace | For Britax B-Safe 35, use Adapter #‎10040 (sold separately) | For Chicco KeyFit 30, use Adapter #‎10020 (sold separately)
COMPACT FOLD: Flat fold and quick-release back wheels allow for hassle-free transport or storage | Folded size: 18.5”L x 15.5”W x 31.5”H

SAFE OPTION: 5-point safety harness with reflective piping for nighttime walks | Stroller includes safety tether to use while jogging | JPMA certified | Weighs: 33 lbs. | Assembled: 44.9”W x 24.4”D x 41.1”H| For ages 9 months up to 50 lbs.
body.description: The Apollo Jogging Stroller by Delta Children delivers peak performance whether you’re hitting the running trail or strolling the sidewalk. An all-terrain jogger with next level maneuverability, this stroller features a front swivel wheel for 360-degrees of ultra-smooth steering while walking or added stability when locked while actively running. The jogger’s suspension system with visible shock absorbers will smooth out any bumps in the road. Equipped with a water resistant UPF 50+ canopy with peek-a-boo window, adjustable foam handlebar, multi-position reclining seat, swing away child tray, parent organizer with two cup holders and reflective material for nighttime runs, the Apollo is designed to keep parents and kids with an active lifestyle happy. And, when you need to take this jogging stroller with you on a day trip or vacation, it folds easily and has quick-release back wheels that allow for hassle-free storage. Stroller recommended for infants, toddlers and kids up to 50 lbs.Fits the following car seats with the included adapter (car seats sold separately): Graco SnugRide Click Connect 30, 35, 40 Evenflo Nurture Evenflo Embrace. For Britax B-Safe 35 Car Seats, please use the Jogger Car Seat Adapter #‎10040-2294 (sold separately). For Chicco KeyFit 30 Car Seats, please use the Jogger Car Seat Adapter #‎10020-2294 (sold separately).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST STROLLER EVER!
reviews.reviewText: I am in love with this stroller. It has zero issues on grass, hills, bumpy or cracked sidewalks, dirt or gravel roads. Super smooth ride. Very easy to put together. My baby looks really comfortable! The back of the stroller reclines so babies can lay back and take a nap. I love being able to take the stroller tray out completely. The stroller folds down really compact. We have a sedan and suv and it fits in both. You can pop the wheels off if you need to. It’s very aesthetic and sleek looking, I love the all black color. It’s easy to wipe down with a washcloth. I have no real complaints. If I HAD to mention something that could be improved — I’m not a big fan of the tray/organizer for parents, but usually the ones that come with strollers are super basic anyway. Not a big deal at all because it’s easy to remove and Amazon has tons of options for different trays or organizers. It does NOT come with the hard plastic clip on cup holders that are featured in Delta Children’s promotional video. You would have to order those separate, but they’re on Amazon. Of all the baby products I’ve bought in the last year, this one is the best one. I wish I had gotten it sooner. I had bought a stroller frame that went with the Graco SnugLock 35. I regret that now because once your child hits about 8 months they’re gonna want to start looking around and not be stuck in the car seat only facing you. Once they hit that weight limit and you get a new car seat, the stroller frame is useless. The Graco SnugLock 35 car seat snaps into this jogging stroller no issue. Get a jogging stroller like this one from the beginning and it will grow with you! I see myself using this jogging stroller for my next kid. It’s great! Also I would mention I believe this jogging stroller is basically the same as their Jeep branded jogging strollers, except a different color pattern and being just a Delta branded one. Not 100% sure on that but when I was doing a quick comparison between this one and their Jeep ones they looked about the same but this one was cheaper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this stroller to stay at my mom-in-laws house because she baby sits my son 2 days a week at her house. She asked for the stroller to come with a Tray, recline and easy on bumpy sidewalks. This checked all those boxes and more. It also has decent storage under and a cup holder, and it’s big enough for a big toddler that’s 99 percentile for his age and doesn’t seem to fit well in many other cheaper strollers. Once I tried this stroller out, I was ready to sell our much more expensive Thule stroller as this compares if not exceeds the Thule. I think the only “benefit” to Thule is that it’s wider so a bit more stable. But living in NY a narrower stroller is just much easier to get around or make it inside a store. With the Thule just getting in a store is an issue because of how wide it is. Once my Mom-in-Law tried it out she said I picked the best stroller, and she mentioned that she loves the height of the handle. She’s a little taller than me and most stroller handles are a bit low for her, this one was perfect for her. Highly recommend this stroller, not a single bad thing to say about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EVERYTHING I WOULD WANT IN A JOGGING STROLLER
reviews.reviewText: The Delta Children Apollo Jogging Stroller is an amazing choice for active parents. It stands out with its lightweight design, providing a smooth ride and effortless maneuverability. Perfect for jogging, it offers ample underneath storage, convenient cup holders to store drinks and your phone, and easy folding for storage. Highly recommended for this jogging stroller for maintaining an active lifestyle while ensuring your child's comfort and safety.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect walking/ running stroller
reviews.reviewText: This stroller was the easiest stroller to put together; it came basically assembled and I didn’t have to do much. Walking and jogging with it is a breeze! It’s super light and smooth on pavement, and it’s light enough to lift up and down my front porch stairs. The stroller material is really sturdy and it looks and feels it’s going to last a really long time! Lastly, I really like the placement of the cup holder. While that may seem insignificant to some, it’s really important for me when I take long walks and jogs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great stroller! Easy to assemble, lightweight, comfortable to use, my daughter loves being in it! The seat reclines back for her naps and reclines pretty forward so that she can see everything! Nice storage feature at the top of the stroller for water bottles and cellphone/wallet. Perfect snack bar for kids! The only reason I’m giving it 4/5 stars is because the storage underneath the stroller is pretty small, not enough coverage for shade for my daughter, and it has a window at the top of stroller so that I can see my daughter inside but the flap doesn’t stay put. But other than that I definitely recommend it for the price. Not disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t want the cheapest jogging stroller, and I didn’t want the most expensive. Extremely easy to fold up and store. It hits bumps in the side walk with ease. The tires are durable and it rolls smoothly.I’m very happy I picked this one and not the cheapest one on Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the best stroller I have ever had! Great on all terrains! Plenty of storage and so easy to push. I absolutely love it.

reviews.reviewerName: I am Yuliya Boryshkevych and I inspire you to create a beautiful life with style in your home and in yourselfI am Yuliya Boryshkevych and I inspire you to create a beautiful life with style in your home and in yourself
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I so excited
reviews.reviewText: What is a stylish stroller? I have never received so many compliments! everyone asks where the stroller is from, what kind of stroller it is, it is very beautiful and very comfortable, the child has a place to put the legs, the child eats, it is very light, easy to assemble and easy to ride.
